name: redevelop
content:

C1 to change an area of a town by replacing old buildings, roads, etc. with new ones

Add to word list
Add to word list
to replace the buildings in an area with new ones: be redeveloped (as/for/into sth) Several neighborhoods in the western part of the city have been redeveloped. Former warehouses will be demolished and redeveloped into a $185 million hotel complex.redevelop land/property/an area Money has been made available from the Economic Development Corporation as part of larger efforts to redevelop the area.redevelop a site/space Talks are continuing with planners about proposals to redevelop the site for office buildings.
